item.description:
Please join us for an excursion to see one of the most talented, soulful singer/songwriters to arrive on the music scene in recent years! In celebration of Michelle's Birthday (12/15/06) we'll be travelling the relatively short distance to Northampton, Mass to support the creative and inspiring sounds of Ray!

It's a Sunday night but the show is set to go off at 8PM and I'm confident we'll all be home at a very reasonable hour in order to prepare for work or school the next day! Take a break from all the holiday-related craziness to enjoy some fine music! You deserve it!

We'll be dining at Siam Square Thai Restaurant at 6PM!

Attached is the website for the Calvin Theatre for tickets and information. The site is really cool, it gives you a seating chart so you can see what's still available and you can select your seat from the seating chart!

Also, please find Ray's website so you can get a sense of what you're getting into - hope to see you there - we'll make a really enjoyable day out of it - you might even forget you have to work or study the next day! Hope to see you there!

From what I'm told - there's not a bad seat in the house!

http://www.iheg.com/c...

http://www.raylamonta...

http://www.siamsquare...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Siam Square (Thai) and Ray Lamontagne at the Calvin Theatre!
